name: Basketball Shot King - Shot Challenge Game
name_original: Basketball Shot King - Shot Challenge Game
description:
Practice your Basketball hoop shooting skills.

Basketball Shot King is a simple and easy to learn, yet amazingly fun Basketball hoop shooting game. Play for as long as you can and get bonus points by not hitting the rim.

The game has no time limit, but the moving basket is a challenge for event experienced players.

Basketball Shot King features:
- Easy fun controls
- Great arcade physics
- Beautiful graphics
- Amazing sound design and music

If you like a simple basketball challenge, this is the game for you!
